snippet: Mika Brzezinski, a co-host on MSNBC's "Morning Joe," talks to The New York Times Magazine about Joe Scarborough's style tips, working early in the morning and her family's history.
abstract: Mika Brzezinski, a co-host on MSNBC's "Morning Joe," talks to The New York Times Magazine about Joe Scarborough's style tips, working early in the morning and her family's history.
